sys_hub_flow.description: Steps in this Flow are to be followed whenever a new employee has to be onboarded in HCL organization, and a service request is raised for the same.

sys_hub_flow.name: HCL New Employee Onboarding

sys_hub_flow_stage.label: Onboarding Formalities Completed and Employee Profile Creation in progress

sys_hub_flow_input.label: Request Item
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_104622e04744711098f58977536d4398

sys_hub_flow_input.label: Table Name
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_104622e04744711098f58977536d4398

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Once the resolver group is notified of the request, we will update the stage of the related catalog task record.

sys_variable_value.value: state=3^work_notes=The Laptop Issuance task has been completed successfully by the resolver group.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: After successful onboarding a mail will be sent to the official email ID of the new employee.

sys_variable_value.value: Onboarding is completed and Employee profile is created successfully.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Flow Variables➛Onboardee Full Name,

We feel immense pleasure to inform you that your onboarding process is completed successfully and your employee profile is created into our database. 

We look forward to warmly welcome you into our HCL organization.

Thanks, and regards.

System Admin.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: We will also update the Requested Item record with modified data from the catalog item form.

sys_element_mapping.value: approval=requested^u_approver={{7c5ca753-6ca4-4199-b721-233511b93710.reporting_manager}}^assigned_to={"display":"System Administrator(AYUSH)","value":"6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441","table":"sys_user","sys_id":"6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441"}^description=Onboarding request has been raised for the employee named, {{flow_variable.onboardee_full_name}}. Please Approve the request so that it can be sent for further processing, within the specified duration.^due_date={{flow_variable.due_date_for_approval}}^priority=2^requested_for={{flow_variable.onboardee_full_name}}^short_description=Onboarding request raised foe a new employee into HCL Organization.^stage=waiting_for_approval^state=1^sc_catalog={"display":"Onboarding to HCL","value":"b9d401f94777211098f58977536d4307","table":"sc_catalog","sys_id":"b9d401f94777211098f58977536d4307"}^cat_item={"display":"Newly Onboarded Employees' Details","value":"110bc57147b7211098f58977536d43b2","table":"sc_cat_item","sys_id":"110bc57147b7211098f58977536d43b2"}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Once onboarding formalities are completed, we will create user record of the employee in organization's database.
Once the resolver group is notified of the request, we will update the stage of the related catalog task record.

sys_variable_value.value: state=3^work_notes=The ODC Access Request task has been completed successfully by the resolver group.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: If the manager approves the request, we will create a catalog task of raising a new laptop issuance request for the onboardee and assign it to respective resolver group.

sys_variable_value.value: This task is assigned to HCL Laptop Issuance team for issuing a new company laptop to the onboarded employee. Please fulfil at the earliest.

sys_element_mapping.value: assignment_group={"display":"HCL Laptop Issuance","value":"dc727c394737211098f58977536d435a","sys_id":"dc727c394737211098f58977536d435a"}^description=Please issue a company laptop for the requested onboardee at the earliest as a part of employee's onboarding process.^priority=2^approval=approved^sc_catalog={"display":"Onboarding to HCL","value":"b9d401f94777211098f58977536d4307","table":"sc_catalog","sys_id":"b9d401f94777211098f58977536d4307"}^due_date={{flow_variable.due_date_for_request_fulfilment}}^cat_item={"display":"Newly Onboarded Employees' Details","value":"110bc57147b7211098f58977536d43b2","table":"sc_cat_item","sys_id":"110bc57147b7211098f58977536d43b2"}^short_description=Laptop Issuance Request has been raised for the onboardee.^state=1^sys_class_name=sc_task^work_notes=HCL Laptop Issuance task is open and necessary action is required.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: When the service request is raised, an approval request will be sent to the RM of the onboardee.
After creating the catalog task, we will fire an event "newLaptopIssuanceRequest" which will then send a notification to the respective resolver group.
As soon as the service request is raised, an already registered event named "newOnboardingServiceRequested" will be fired. This event will cause a notification to be sent to the RM.
We will update the approval and related fields to approved stage in the Request record.

sys_element_mapping.value: approval=approved^request_state=in_process^stage=fulfillment^state=2^work_notes=Onboarding request is approved by reporting manager: {{7c5ca753-6ca4-4199-b721-233511b93710.reporting_manager}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: We will update the approval and related fields to approved stage in the Requested Item record.

sys_variable_value.value: approval=approved^stage=Fulfillment^state=2^work_notes=Onboarding request has been approved by reporting manager.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: After creating the catalog task, we will fire an event "newO365MailboxCreationRequest" which will then send a notification to the respective resolver group.
If the manager approves the request, we will create a catalog task of creating O365 Mailbox for the onboardee and assign it to respective resolver group.

sys_variable_value.value: This task is assigned to O365 Team for Mailbox creation of onboarded employee. Please fulfil at the earliest.

sys_element_mapping.value: assignment_group={"display":"HCL O365 Mailbox Creation","value":"f98430b94737211098f58977536d43c0","sys_id":"f98430b94737211098f58977536d43c0"}^description=Please create the MS Office 365 Mailbox Account for the requested onboardee at the earliest as a part of employee's onboarding process.^priority=2^approval=approved^sc_catalog={"display":"Onboarding to HCL","value":"b9d401f94777211098f58977536d4307","table":"sc_catalog","sys_id":"b9d401f94777211098f58977536d4307"}^due_date={{flow_variable.due_date_for_request_fulfilment}}^cat_item={"display":"Newly Onboarded Employees' Details","value":"110bc57147b7211098f58977536d43b2","table":"sc_cat_item","sys_id":"110bc57147b7211098f58977536d43b2"}^short_description=MS Office 365 Mailbox Creation for requested onboardee.^state=1^sys_class_name=sc_task^work_notes=MS Office 365 MAilbox creation task is open and necessary action is required.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Once the resolver group is notified of the request, we will update the stage of the related catalog task record.

sys_variable_value.value: state=3^work_notes=The Office 365 Mailbox creation task has been completed successfully by the resolver group.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: After creating the catalog task, we will fire an event "newODCAccessRequestRaised" which will then send a notification to the respective resolver group.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Flow Variables➛Onboardee Full Name,

We whole heartedly regret to inform you that your onboarding formalities could not be completed and you profile creation also failed.

But, you can still keep on applying for new positions in our organization. We wish you all the best for your future.

Thanks, and regards.

System Admin.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: If the manager approves the request, we will create a catalog task of raising the ODC access request for the onboardee and assign it to respective resolver group.

sys_variable_value.value: This task is assigned to HCL ODC Access team for providing the ODC access to the newly onboarded employee. Please fulfil at the earliest.

sys_element_mapping.value: assignment_group={"display":"HCL ODC Access","value":"ea147cfd47f3211098f58977536d4385","sys_id":"ea147cfd47f3211098f58977536d4385"}^description=Please fulfil the ODC Access request for the new onboardee at the earliest as a part of employee's onboarding process.^priority=2^approval=approved^sc_catalog={"display":"Onboarding to HCL","value":"b9d401f94777211098f58977536d4307","table":"sc_catalog","sys_id":"b9d401f94777211098f58977536d4307"}^due_date={{flow_variable.due_date_for_approval}}^cat_item={"display":"Newly Onboarded Employees' Details","value":"110bc57147b7211098f58977536d43b2","table":"sc_cat_item","sys_id":"110bc57147b7211098f58977536d43b2"}^short_description=ODC Access Request has been raised for the onboardee. ^state=1^sys_class_name=sc_task^work_notes=ODC Access Fulfilment task is open and necessary action is required.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Once a new onboarding request is raised, we will update the Request record with modified data from the catalog item form.

sys_element_mapping.value: approval=requested^assigned_to={"display":"System Administrator(AYUSH)","value":"6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441","table":"sys_user","sys_id":"6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441"}^business_duration=1970-01-11 00:00:00^description=A new employee's onboarding request is raised by the concerned department and needs to be fulfilled within the specified duration.^due_date={{flow_variable.due_date_for_approval}}^request_state=requested^requested_for={{flow_variable.onboardee_full_name}}^short_description=Onboarding request raised for a new employee named {{flow_variable.onboardee_full_name}}.^stage=requested^state=1^priority=2^=

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: First and foremost we need access to the variables of the "Newly Onboarded Employee's Details" Catalog Item. So we will get those variables.

variable.display_value: Template Catalog Items and Variable Sets

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Then we will perform catalog-tasks creation steps in parallel.
If onboarding request is approved by the onboardee's manager, we will proceed with the next onboarding formalities.

sys_variable_value.value: Onboarding Service Request is approved by the RM.

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: We will set current date, a due date for the manager approval, and also update the onboardee's full name and other variables.

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: When the service request is raised, an approval request will be sent to the RM of the onboardee.
